website_summaries.verdict: Infused with natural ingredients, this 0.7 ounce lip mask is refreshing and effective in providing soft and hydrated lips.
pros: Makes lips softer and allows them to feel more hydrated
Has the consistency of a gel or cream and is not too oily
Only a little is needed to be effective, making it long-lasting
cons: May cause irritation for those with sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best lip products I've used! This product worked the best for me. Because before using this lip mask my lips were super dry. I finally know what normal lips feel. It has a Matcha scent to it, but isn't strong and does not taste like anything. It looks like it's going to last me a while, even when I use a thick layer of it. I used it mostly for night time, but due to the results, I even implemented it during my daily routing as a balm. This product is worth the money and because it helped me with the dry lips issue. It's a must buy product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I get married in two months and when I went to do my makeup trial my lipstick looked horrible because of my dry lips
customer_reviews.text: It really works! I have had dry lips most of my life. I get married in two months and when I went to do my makeup trial my lipstick looked horrible because of my dry lips! I was worried because i do use chapstick! I started using this product and OMG it’s amazing! My lips look so good! Even my soon to be husband kissed me and said my lips when so soft and smooth 😱😍 I love this product! And my lips will look great for the wedding!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Family

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a lot of matte lipsticks that dry my lips out, so I put this stuff on after I take my makeup off & go to bed. The difference in the morning is amazing! I love the light smell, the generous amount you get (I was not expecting the jar to be so large & you only use a little at a time so it should last a long time), and the fact that it comes with its own little brush. I have long nails & getting product out of a jar without getting it my nail is always a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: MommaOf3

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: No real long-term benefits.... This is essentially just scented coconut oil. It smells nice. It applies smoothly. It feels great when it's on. And I do think the vitamin E helps it to absorb into the lips a little better than just coconut oil. But once it absorbs, it's done. There is no lasting effect. I do think the jar will last a long time, so price is pretty decent. Not great. But decent. Overall, meh.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita

customer_reviews.title: This is just a regular lip balm, nothing special ...
customer_reviews.text: This is just a regular lip balm, nothing special about it! The only difference is that it cost more than the other ones.for 10.00$ you can get a set of 4 organic and no chemicals.....Save your money!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good sleeping mask. It was not hydrating enough for me personally, but I have chronically dry lips, so most products aren’t. It has silky smooth texture, which I love and does feel very nice on. I use during the day (comes with a cute brush for easy application) or just layer something heavier on top at night. For most people, I definitely think this will be hydrating enough because of wonderful ingredients and consistency. Highly recommend. Outstanding customer service too!
customer_reviews.author: Leto74

customer_reviews.title: It does help!
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling for a few years now with very dry lips. After going through menopause, my lips always felt very dry and Chapped. I had tried hundreds of products, but nothing lasted or worked very well. Then I tried this lip mask. After about 2 weeks, I am noticing that my lips are feeling better. I am not licking my lips every few minutes anymore. I hope it will continue to get better. So I can highly recommend this lip treatment. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lip Mask? Who Knew? Now You Do...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I’ve tried a mask for my lips. I use facial masks a couple times a week. I also have two facial gel that work like this lip mask, which are left on over night. So when I came across the lip mask I thought what a find. I’m a skin junkie, meaning I take great care of my skin. And I haven’t come across anything like this lip mask. It’s awesome, not greasy. It stays on all night. The next morning my lips a soft. I’ll definitely order this lip mask again.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S Brown

customer_reviews.title: Weird Smell
customer_reviews.text: The smell is unpleasant to me, too perfumy smelling for something labeled “natural.”
customer_reviews.author: Cphillips

customer_reviews.title: Not sticky, just plain smoothness
customer_reviews.text: Me and my bf love this lip mask. It's so smoothing. It goes on super smooth, the texture is kind of oily once you put it on but that's is not bad at all. The lip mask is not tacky, or sticky or anything, when you rub your lips together, they just glide easily, sooo smooth. In the morning we don't have anything on so it doesn't leave a residue, just our bare smooth and soft lips.
customer_reviews.author: steven morales

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say I’m glad I got this. The texture is nice, but the taste is really unpleasant. A pretty big oversight on a product used on the lips. Also I can’t yet see any measurable improvement to my lip dryness. Not sure how long they expect a customer to use it before getting results. Also the brush cover doesn’t fit the brush and keeps falling off. So that’s a waste. I’m rather surprised that people liked it this lip “mask” which is why I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly J.

customer_reviews.title: VASELINE
customer_reviews.text: Terribly disappointing. Nothing other than Vaseline. CONSTANTLY HAVE TO REAPPLY AND I LIVE IN THE HUMID SOUTH. Can’t imagine living up North! Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Dena Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Won’t purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t do a thing. It’s just greasy on sits on lips. My lips actual become worse after a few nights of using the product.
customer_reviews.author: K lee

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff. I use it as a balm when I need it during the day, and as an overnight lip mask it actually works really well. I use a generous amount at night and in the morning my lips are actually very soft and moisturized, much more than if I use a regular lip balm. It has a mild herbal/green tea scent that doesn't offend me. I've been looking for a product like this and I'll probably buy more when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: bikinibe4n

customer_reviews.title: Leaves lips feeling dry
customer_reviews.text: I put this on before I go to bed, have been for a week now. Just leaves my lips dry and the same as before. It smells good, but it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is not all that at all. I’ve had much much better moisturizer. I am sorry I paid so much for this. I guess I assumed since it was more it wld be better but not so much. I would pay $1-2 for this after using it and no more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product at night for over a month now. It’s light, not sticky, and feels good on your lips. Very subltle scent, barely there. Besides looking smoother and feeling moist, I’ve notice a subtle plumping effect from the extra hydration. I’ve also noticed my lip borders are looking more defined again, which I’ve lost with age. I highly recommend this treatment for anyone looking for improvement in dryness and lip texture.
customer_reviews.author: Pedidoc Mom

customer_reviews.title: Miracle lip balm
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I purchased this product because I live in Florida and have to keep my lips protected at all times due to the humidity and sun exposure. After just a couple of days of use, I could feel the difference on my lips. I often wear long wear lipstick, so I purchase the all-day wear. The problem is that it chips with time. Therefore I decided to try the Matcha as a base and wow! Not only did it work great as a base, it actually helped the lipstick and gloss stay on all day. I definitely recommend this product. It has many benefits and more than one use.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent
customer_reviews.text: This balm smells really very lovely. It's probably my favorite thing about it. I also like the packaging, which is cute and convenient. It comes with a little brush that's very soft that I like to use a lot. I do have to use it a lot, so I think it's probably better for daytime use than nighttime, but it may depend on how cracked and dry your lips are. The brush fits into a little hole in the box so it's very convenient. I do wish it had some beeswax and/or lanolin and maybe some essential oils, but if it did I think it'd be perfect. I put four stars especially because the seller was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Talitha M.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without it
customer_reviews.text: I was using a very expensive lip serum (R&F) that I loved but decided to do some research to find a comparable product that didn’t cost $50/month! I tried several products including this one based on reviews and it is every bit as good at keeping my lips super soft and moist. One small jar lasted me months. My son is on a medication that is terribly drying and left his lips cracked and bleeding. A few days with this and they are perfect. His dermatologist was very impressed and even approved the ingredients. This product is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: A. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Basically just coconut oil. If coconut oil works well for your skin type, just get a jar of that and use it. This lip mask isn’t much of a mask. It’s very slippery, it goes on in a very thin layer and, after it absorbs, my lips are no more hydrated than before use. They even feel a bit more dry.If you want a nice thick lip mask that will keep your lips hydrated, sticks around while you sleep, and leaves lips supple feeling long after the product absorbs, just use a small dab of Weleda Skin Food. I’ve tried this Machta lip mask but I will be going back to my Weleda
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: Aside from the silly brush, it’s def moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Okay there are pros and cons to this one. It is moisturizing for sure. Seems to last long too. The price is a bit high for what it is, but it’s also a large pot. The brush that comes with it feels kind of silly and unnessecary. But this should last a good long time. There isn’t much in the way or flavor, it’s very light. And not much scent either. It definitely works better than run of the mill chapstick though. I’m torn on buying more haha
customer_reviews.author: Denise Okeefe

customer_reviews.title: No protective seal or wrap
customer_reviews.text: It came in a regular box as any other product. The surprise was when I opened the product it was already been used and even the stick that came with it was greasy and oily which also indicates someone else used it. I cannot trust a product like this. I asked for a refund immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Ali

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, better lip mask out there.
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizies but made with mainly oils so it's not a gel that sets overnight like most but a spreadable oil that immediately dissolves when put on. It smells gross, taste kinda odd when applied, but that's because after thinking it would resemble green tea it actually contains peppermint oil which throws you off completely with the scent and the tingly effect. Not a fan, but does the job. Not sure how this is rated so high.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizing lip mask
customer_reviews.text: This lip mask is really awesome, I use it every night before sleep and it really helps me, I had dry lips but after started using this my lips are softer, I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Dayana E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for lips!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for two weeks, and so far, it is as good, if not better, than a considerably more expensive lip treatment I had been using. I put it on at night and awake to soft, smooth lips. While it doesn't rid my 73 year old lips of all lines, it does give them a smoother, fuller appearance. I will definitely purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Mbrown

customer_reviews.title: Super soft lips
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised how soft my lips were after using this product only a few times, so far. It looks kind of like a wax but is softer and creamier. I doesn't take much and spreads very easily. It has a light pleasant smell and the taste is okay. I put it on before bed and it remains on through the night. I woke up with my lips feeling softer for sure! I don't think I'd wear it during the daytime as I'm really not a fan of the taste. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne McKittrick

customer_reviews.title: Dries up your lips after a few days.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this every night. After about 2 weeks, my lips are super dry and completely peeling. I am a lip moisture queen. I love Dr. Hauschka, Dr. Rogers restore. I bought this as a night lip mask since that the claims! It is the worst I’ve ever used!! It has some odd cheap additive that makes you feel moisturized when applied. But after a few days, your lips are dryer than ever and cracked! Now I’m back to Restore and will never change again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazons favorite customer

customer_reviews.title: Was not at all like it was described
customer_reviews.text: Was not at all like it was described!! It was nothing like a lip healing mask it was like applying vasoline to my lips & was just as greasy. Didn’t stay on long. Putting on at bedtime didn’t help because it wipes right off when moving
customer_reviews.author: RMP

customer_reviews.title: Total joke. Vaseline with a hint of greeen tea ...
customer_reviews.text: Total joke. Vaseline with a hint of greeen tea flavor. Not at all moisturizing, no idea how this is advertised as a “mask”. Lip brush cover does not fit lip brush, falls right off, exposing brush dust, lint, etc...
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Marinacci

customer_reviews.title: So far I like it. It really moist the lip area but ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this product last week & been using it for about a week. So far I like it. It really moist the lip area but I feel it doesn't really stayed on lip long enough, kept licking the moist off. The taste taste like just mint but was ok, doesn't really bother me. It came with a little brush, that's one thing was ok too but if I lost the box outside there's no place to put the brush stick to hold with the lip cream, LOL......... Over all, was worth it to try, price is ok for the product. I might buy it again & recommend to other who have dry lip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and luxurious feeling
customer_reviews.text: This product of wells wonderful on my lips--silky, smooth,and luxurious. I haven't been using it long but I am pleased that when I wake up there is a definite softness and smoothness that I didn't have with other products. The scent is clean and there is no flavor, which is f8ne with me. I'm pleased to have found this and to be getting the results I've had so far.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Morehart

customer_reviews.title: Moisture Doesn’t Last
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try this product due to all the great reviews, but I’ve found the product to be just ok. I’ve been putting it on every night before bed & sometimes during the day. When it’s first apply it, my lips look great but the moisture itself doesn’t last. When I wake up in the morning my lips don’t seem like I applied anything at all (I’m not eating or drinking during the night just to be clear). I’ve had better luck with Vaseline.
customer_reviews.author: dsayshello

customer_reviews.title: I'll never use chapstick again after this
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff! It keeps my lips soft and smooth for hours. I usually only wear chapstick and I am constantly having to apply it all throughout the day. With Matcha Moisturizing Lip Mask I only need to put some on maybe 2 or 3 times a day and my lips feel amazing. This is the only stuff I will use from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a lip product nut! I want all the lip things! This one fell short of my expectations. It didn't really last as long as I thought it would. The moisture absorbs really quickly. I was hoping for something a little more lasting. I didn't care too much for the scent or flavor either. I'll use it occasionally but I probably wouldn't purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittnie Day

customer_reviews.title: Very efficent. Good for winter.
customer_reviews.text: This works really well. I put it on right before I go to sleep and wake up with soft lips that last all day. Its possible you don't need to use it every night it is so efficient. The brush is a little cheap though. It does not fully click into its cover and if you push the brush into the cover tube to make it snug it'll break the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Merida Sneller

customer_reviews.title: Good daily lip balm but nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I have thin and chapped lips, during colder weather I am finding the need to constantly moisturize my lips. I purchased this product to not only provide temporary moisture to my lips which I could have achieved from the countless jars of Vaseline or chapsticks lying around the house, but for long term moisture resulting in pinker and softer lips. After using this product daytime and overnight (twice daily) for several days, or even weeks, I have not noticed a drastic change. Yes it will provide with great moisture like a good lip balm should - but if you are expecting a significant and long term change that is highly noticeable then you may be slightly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alian

customer_reviews.title: SO Helpful from use of IV infusion medications drying lips
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Incredible for your lips a must have. Love the applicator brush with cover. Great for sanitary reasons and not to get product under fingernails. Plus this means you use less product, I tend to scoop too much. My lips dry out from harsh IV meds. This has helped SO much!
customer_reviews.author: KLDavis

customer_reviews.title: Soft lips
customer_reviews.text: I've had this lip mask for about two weeks now and I've been using it every night. I have definitely noticed an improvement in not only the texture but also the color of my lips. I used to have very pale lips but I've noticed since using this their natural vibrancy is coming out. I wake up and my lips are soft and smooth and I don't have to apply a balm right away. I used to reapply chapstick every two hours or so on a normal day, and while I still use chapstick it is very infrequent. A small amount goes a long way so I imagine it will be some time before I have to reorder.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product for lips!
customer_reviews.text: Although I have only been using the product for about 10 days I love the way it has helped with moisturizing these "older lips". The cracking has almost disappeared completely. And I do believe that it has plumped them up a bit. Hopefully the plumping will continue? It's a lot cheaper, nevermind less painful, than the surgical alternatives available. Keep up the good work Green TEA Match Sleeping Balm.
customer_reviews.author: hartgrl

customer_reviews.title: Love, love everything about this lip mask!
customer_reviews.text: Love love everything about this lip mask! The scent is light and not overwhelming. It made my lips moisturized and very healthy only after first few uses. I’m really happy that it did what it promised, and was not another worthless lip mask that claims that it works. I also want to highlight the customer service, seller followed up to make sure everything was great with my order. If you’re looking for a lip mask that truly works, don’t look any further.
customer_reviews.author: Denis  Agleev

customer_reviews.title: I loved this product at first
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product at first, using it every night before bed. I had high hopes as the reviews I read raved on and on about how soft their lips were in the morning and how the product was still on their lips in the morning. My lips do not have any product left after about 30 minutes later and have started to peel. I think this is because it has coconut oil in it which can actually be drying to skin. Who knows. It's great for others but mediocre to me.
customer_reviews.author: Peachy219

customer_reviews.title: really works
customer_reviews.text: Ok, i am older than most and felt my lips needed some attention. I saw this night lip mask and just ordered it to try out. I have noticed that my lips are softer, feel a bit plumper (old so i need plumping) and, the smell is soothing. I was worried about a taste and there is none. I recommend Moisturizing Green Tea Matcha Sleeping Lip Mask Balm.
customer_reviews.author: France Webster

customer_reviews.title: Super soft lips
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait a few days, using it regularly. I’ve done so now for about a week and I like the results. My lips which were always dry and peeling are now soft. I only use it at night. I wear a gloss during the day which goes on smooth. I don’t wear lipstick often but the true test will be to see how that goes on as I was always able to see where my lips peeled and it didn’t go on evenly. I’ll post an update when this happens. For now, it’s definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH A

customer_reviews.title: At last a product that helps my dry, cracking lips!
customer_reviews.text: At last a product that helps my dry, cracking lips. I was waking up with lips so dry they would crack and peel. Wearing any kind of lip stick was not possible. Frequent applications of lip waxes throughout the day just covered the lips, but did not heal them. And only lasted for a few hours. After my first night using this product I awoke to softer lips. It took a few days for the cracks to completely heal, but they have not returned. I use it to cover my lips and the skin just adjacent to the lips each night. Thank you for creating a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Consider the Manufacturing Source
customer_reviews.text: Whoa! This product was made in China! I started to use it but looked at the wrapping first, and wouldn’t use it after those words. If these ppl tried using mercury in children’s jewelry, followed by pet food poisoning, I don’t trust them.
customer_reviews.author: Annie W.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have chronic dry lips and have tried every single chapstick there is and then I came across this mask. It’s great value and truly smooths lips! I also have thin lips and think the smoothing process has helped make my lips look a little bit more full. Not dramatic, but just a little. I love this stuff. I apply multiple times daily for max results also. It’s almost addicting. Would recommend to all!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!!
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews before buying it because I wanted something that would make my lips look younger and less dry. This product does the work, it leaves my lips smooth and the next day I barely need to apply chapstick. Ever since I started using it I need to apply less chapstick. I really like the smell and taste too.
customer_reviews.author: Gaudy Batres

customer_reviews.title: Not moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I got the matcha one being excited to try a lip product that smells like matcha which is an interesting concept, unfortunately it wasn't matcha the flavor. The match one smells like lime. As for moisturizing, it is only for about 30 seconds then it feels dry like you need to keep putting more on. I was fooled by the reviews smh
customer_reviews.author: Vidzz

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff...I wear it all day everyday! It has just the right amount of sheen and softens my lips. What I really love is that gentle scent, not over powering or fruity at all. I can’t really explain it, it’s just a “clean” scent. Comes with an application brush but I have to be honest, I only use that when I right in front of a mirror...otherwise, I just use my fingers. Will repurchase for certain!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. H2

customer_reviews.title: Best lip moisturizer ever !
customer_reviews.text: Really love this moisturizer. I work long hours and for some reason lick my lips to the point of cracking and severe dryness. Regular chapstick just doesn't help relieve my the cracking and soreness. I don't write reviews on a regular basis but Matcha has been solved my problem and it really deserves high praise . If you buy and try different types of chapsticks that end up at the bottom of your purse because it has no impact BUY matcha it works so well you will never need another lip moisturizer. Like be this product !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: makes lops so soft
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! My lips were so dry this part winter, to the point that they were painfully cracking. I tried everything to soothe my lips but nothing seemed to provide continuous moisture. I bought this. The product itself is thick but not sticky, a little bit goes a long way. For me after only one use I could tell a difference, it left my lips soft and allowed the peeling and cracking to start to heal. I even apply a little bit underneath my lip gloss for an extra kick of moisture. This will definitely be a staple in beauty routine.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: This lip mask balm did not work for me. The smell is more like chemicals than green tea. I regularly drink all types of matcha and green tea. I even enjoy green tea ice cream and many other matcha products but this is nothing like any of those scents or flavors. It also was not moisturizing for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Elona

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing lip product I've ever owned! It's super silky on your lips and doesn't feel sticky and also super duper hydrating! You can honestly use it on a daily basis even during the day! It's a mask, obviously (a sleep-in-type) but it doesn't feel heavy at all. It is very light and smooth like silk. Before using the product, I have very dry lips and it kinda peels. I bought tons of products to solve that problem but it couldn't work till I got this. My lips feel hydrated after using it. This is something I will own and use it forever!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Buelow

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love,love, LOOOVE this product! My lips feel amazing! I only use it at night time and my lips feel super smooth and the look so healthy and younger! I absolutely love this moisturizer green tea for my lips!
customer_reviews.author: HappyCamper

customer_reviews.title: Rashy lips after the first few uses
customer_reviews.text: It came in a cute little box and has a cute little container. I used this product for about two weeks, after the first few days, a scaly rash developed on my lips so i continued to use it for a week after, but it got way worse. I stopped using it and started using Burts Bees chapstick instead, and my lips healed and got better. After a while, i decided to try it out again one night, and lo and behold, another rash. If you want quality lip products, i’d recommend Burts Bees instead of this. Though i know products dont work the same for everyone, this one is just, idk man.
customer_reviews.author: Rin

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy! Your lips will remain dry
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't work. My lips was still dry. I used the product as advised and when I woke up the next morning my lips was dry and white as if I was smoking crack. My lips looked like the crack head character on The Dave Chappelle show 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Skeewee

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate hydration and smoothing
customer_reviews.text: I have always suffered from dry cracked lips. I regularly use Burt’s Bees and EOS but it was all temporary. I put this on before bed and have only used it a week and see a significant difference! My lips are smoother and have more luster!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Magical!
customer_reviews.text: This balm works like magic!As a nursing mom I'm looking for only natural and harmless products, and this is it. While very few things really work, this mask made it easy to keep my lips moisturized at all times (while you are always dehydrated from nursing especially during Texas summer) and even overnight. It is soft, soothing and has a light pleasant scent of green tea and comes with a little brush to apply it on your lips. I could not be more satisfied! Highly recommend! Ordering more for gifts for my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lip Mask did not work overnight...
customer_reviews.text: I’m really hoping I can come back and give this review higher marks but, at this point I’m not sure if I’ve received any benefits. I think the packaging is nice, I don’t mind the smell and, it seems moisturing when I put it on my lips. Honestly, its not too different from putting Vaseline on my lips. I increased my useage to twice a day so that there might be a difference but, I guess I need to give it more time. I’ll give another update after using slightly longer.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Nightly skincare routine feels complete now.
customer_reviews.text: This is what my night time routine was missing! I’ve been using this for almost 2 weeks and am very happy with how moisturized and less flaky my lips are. I forget to add chapsticks through the day so having this as part of my night time routine works perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Adkins

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for around a month and a half, I put it on every night before sleeping and I have observed a very visible difference after using this sleeping mask. It tingles on my lips a very little bit but otherwise feels like a thicker lip balm. Smells really nice. But the effects, in my opinion are way more potent than any balms I've ever used. My lips feel (and even appear!) plumper and softer and the effects stay even after nights I've forgotten to apply it. Overall, will definitely repurchase and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be more happier with the results
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a family member. This is what she told me: This Green Tea Lip Mask works wonders! I've used it for approximately month now and my lips got significantly smoother and younger looking. I couldn't be more happier with the results. I read some comments on the taste, personally I've bought many lip balms and none of them tasted delicious. This lip mask has a neutral taste, it gives of a little Matcha taste. But I personally did not expect to eat it. If you want results and have a healthier lips, this lip mask is way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This product works well does what it describes. I found in my case I have to reapply consistently to get the results. I like the fact its not sticky like a lot of these types of products
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. My lips were getting dry and by putting this on at night my lips are softer, less wrinkles and a little plumper. No smell or taste which I love.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lip mask! I have dry chapped peeling lips thanks to celiac and vitamin deficiencies. This helps repair them nightly and leaves them nicer than without using it. I can see it will need to be used regularly for the results to remain. I like the smell and flavor. Its worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: bameiboo

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: It really works! I live in Colorado where the humidity is ~ 20% (really low ) and because of this I have problems with dry lips and I was really surprised with this product couse it really works. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Serghei Polisciuc

customer_reviews.title: Chapstick are cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money. Ladies buy yourself a Chapstick. I gave it a 1 star rating because you can't leave a review with 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Miles

customer_reviews.title: This silky lip mask will prepare your lips to give the best morning kiss ever!!!?
customer_reviews.text: This product goes on like silk and stays in all night. You awaken with the softest, smoothest lips just waiting to give an awesome good morning kiss. An amazing addition to the lip mask, which is clear not green, is the lip brush. Will keep your products more sanitary. I love this and am going to check out app of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Dedicated to this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have repeatedly purchased this product after a bout of chapped lips. The product not only resolved my chapped lips but I love how silky and shiny my now moisturized lips look and feel! I will continue to purchase this product! I have tried the Berry and the Matcha and love them equally!
customer_reviews.author: Erin A Roman

customer_reviews.title: Wow great product, you need to buy
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and the product still exceeded my expectations. I put it on every night before bed. I’m almost 50 and want to help my dry lips as well as lines. I have noticed a difference in their appearance
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Seal in moisture overnight and condition your lips. The taste is pretty pleasant and the scent is subtle. I have to personally interchange this with other products to reap the true benefits. My lips tend to has a plastic like feel if I use only this product for multiple days in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Will never buy another lip balm again!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll never use another chapstick. Aquaphor was my go too but sometimes my skin would get congested around my lips from it. This matcha tea lip balm is AMAZING! Even my husband loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Liz D.

customer_reviews.title: Took a few days, but wow did it work when it took effect
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was really skeptical, after all, I had been using it in the morning when I woke up and at night right before bedtime but was seeing no real effect. And then, after almost a week of use, I realized that even without chapstick my lips didn't look (or feel) all that chapped, nor were my lips peeling as often (which tends to happen whenever the temperature starts to change and my lips get chapped over the course of the day). Overall, I'm very happy with this lip mask, and I intend to keep it in my daily routine.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Best lip moisturizer ever!
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the best moisturizers I’ve ever used on my lips! It moisturizes without leaving any kind of sticky/waxy residue and has a fresh, subtle scent. Will definitely be repurchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Brittnay

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The only positive thing about this product in my experience and opinion is that it smells nice. Other than that there’s nothing much to it. It will only keep my lips moisturized as long as I have a big glop on but as soon as it wears off my lips are back to being dry.
customer_reviews.author: Velia Balderrama

customer_reviews.title: really worked
customer_reviews.text: I love this item, its been the only thing to really work. I had slightly dry, kind of tight lips, I tried several different natural balms, chapsticks etc, and this has worked beautifully. I wear it every night and it leaves my lips moisturized and soft. I'm hooked, will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Supple soft sexy lips
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product! The cold months during the night my lips were burning, cracking and peeling. Vaseline wasn't doing the job. Ever night I treat the lips and by morning the lips are protected. It took a couple of weeks to really see results. My lips are fully ! I will definitely repurchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best moisturizing lip mask ever. Put it on when you go to sleep and wake up with soft beautiful lips. I can even put it on when I first get up in the morning and by the time I'm done with my morning routine, my lips are soft and moisturized. I love matte lip sticks but they can be so incredibly drying to the lips, so this lip mask is the key to getting my lips soft again every day. Love it!! Green tea matcha is my favorite out of the two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the hype
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. I moved from the east coast to Texas and have been battling in general with dry skin, but my lips got the worst of it. I put this stuff on every night and in the morning, and I hardly need lip balm during the day. I also think the high moisture provides a slight plumping effect. Overall my lips look smooth and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: CJ H.

customer_reviews.title: Great texture
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this for a few days so I can't give a result involving results just yet, but so far, I really like the lip balm! I love the little brush that came with it, too....brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: tracigiez

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and I can see and feel happy that I started using it. This is my third order and I love the packaging as well so I'm going to order as gifts for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth 98

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing lip mask
customer_reviews.text: Smells a little weird, doesn't quite smell like green tea. The substance is also a little viscous and not what I expected given other lip masks. Also wears off pretty quickly and doesn't stay on as long as other lip masks I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: A. W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It is lightweight and great for hydration. I use it as a lipgloss v. A mask. I think that the description may be misleading. It is not very heavy but does hydrate for me. My lips get dry but are not cracked. I love the fresh feel and scent of this product!
customer_reviews.author: lynda kosnik

customer_reviews.title: Works quickly! Smooth bottom lip! No more chipped lips to bite off!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I’ve always had chipped lips and bit them! Bad habit! It works fast! Just applied it for a few days throughout the day and at night! Also used a lip scrub (sugar and olive oil based) to remove the excess dry skin because it healed so fast and it’s like magic! No more chipped lips to bite off!!! Finally!
customer_reviews.author: Dalia Khalaf

customer_reviews.title: This is the stuff I have been looking for for 5 years!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! It's light, powerful, easily portable, and perfectly discreet. I've been using it for almost a week and I am a firm believer! My lips are smooth, soft, and actually HEALING. My lips were cracked and peeling everyday no matter what intense lip therapies that I applied. So insanely thankful for the makers of this little jewel. The gratitude is real lol.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: Great for lip hydration
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I use it every night as described and when my lips are too dry, during the day as well. My lips stay hydrated all night. It is not sticky which is great! I love the smell and taste.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi M.

customer_reviews.title: Lips still chapped and dry after sleeping with the 'mask'
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was going to do better for repair while sleeping. Im not sure how this product is so well liked. It doesn't seem like a lip mask at all, just coconut oil, very thin oily feel. I love the scent but I dont think this is effective at all.
customer_reviews.author: Adree D Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Like the scent.
customer_reviews.text: I love the green tea scent of this lip moisturizer. It comes with the little brush. The reason I took one star off was because it doesn't seem to make my lip soft as it advertises. I usually use it overnight. Maybe I will try to use it more often during the day as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kiara. Z

customer_reviews.title: It seriously works!
customer_reviews.text: My lips have been so chapped and not a single brand of chapstick was helping. Decided to try this out and after the first night of using it I already saw a difference. I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Trebeca

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturizing. Really helped me with my dry lips. I put a good layer on before bed each night and it has really made my lips not so uncomfortable, tight, and chapped.
customer_reviews.author: California Dreaming

customer_reviews.title: Petroleum jelly with colour and fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Smells like petroleum jelly. Very thin does not adhere to lips. You certainly can't expect it to last overnight and I haven't seen any difference in my lips. Last seen in my office junk drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Kingston

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: My lips have always been dry. The lip balms I was compulsively applaying all day still left my lips dry and flaky in the morning when I woke up, but ever since using this lip sleeping mask, my lips have stopped flaking so intensely. I also sometimes use this as I get ready, so I put a little on like a balm before I start doing my makeup and by the time I get to doing my lips, they're absolutely luscious.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It really helps with my dry lips when I use it at bedtime. It's not as heavy as other products that I used before. It comes with a little applicator which is great so you don't have to dip your fingers in. I got the matcha one but would want to try the other colors also.
customer_reviews.author: Dminor

customer_reviews.title: Cause Long-term Dryness & Damage
customer_reviews.text: Using this product has caused my lips to become extremely dry and the skin seems damaged. I am not sure if it is due to an allergic reaction, an incorrectly mixed product, or something else. However, I do drink matcha smoothies with no adverse effects, so I think an allergic reaction is unlikely. I have stopped using this product and am hoping my lips will heal.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical of this at first, but let me tell you...this stuff is amazing. I’ve always had very chapped lips and have tried so many lip products. The morning after the first application, my lips felt amazing. I’ve been using this for a couple of weeks and it has remained effective. Another plus is that it smells nice and doesn’t taste nasty (or like anything at all for that matter). If you have chapped lips, do yourself a favor and buy this-you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura F

customer_reviews.title: This is my holy grail
customer_reviews.text: I've always had chapped lips but I don't know what it is with this year that's making them dryer than usual. (Maybe weather) I'm a huge lip balm junkie, tried everything. This matcha sleeping lip mask changed my world. I woke up with super soft and plump lips. It is a sticky consistency but I wash it off. The effects last at least half the day before my lips will start feeling dry again. Which is honestly really amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Living in the desert my lips get very dry. I’ve tried just about everything! This product works in keeping my lips most and smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Tons of moisture
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for a few days and I’m in love! My lips feel soft again! Great for any time of the day. Prior my lips were very dry and prone to cracking.
customer_reviews.author: Chigirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell, but no results
customer_reviews.text: I liked the smell and that is about it. It made no difference for my lips. It is very similar to vaseline in the way it feels on the lips, which I am not a big fan of. It does not absorb nor does it nourish the lips. The moment you wipe it off, the lips are dry
customer_reviews.author: OLGA

product_meta.title: Moisturizing Green Tea Matcha Sleeping Lip Mask Balm, Younger Looking Lips Overnight, Best Solution For Chapped And Cracked Lips, Unique Lip Gloss Formula And Power Benefits Of Green Tea (Matcha)
feature_bullets: ✅ PROVIDES HYDRATION AND PROTECTION: MATCHA MOISTURIZING LIP MASK PROTECTS your LIPS from drying and REJUVENATES them while you sleep.

✅ HEAL AND TREAT CRACKED AND DAMAGED LIPS: MATCHA MOISTURIZING LIP MASK FORMULA INFUSED with power NATURAL ingredients of GREEN TEA EXTRACT, COCONUT OIL and VITAMIN E, all of which target DRY and CRACKED LIPS.

✅ NO OVERWHELMING ODOR OR TASTE: MATCHA MOISTURIZING LIP MASK has a very faint, mild green tea fragrance that doesn't overpower. This not sticky formula is an amazing all day and all night treatment, that will get very addicting for your lips.
✅ LIP PROTECTION: MATCHA MOISTURIZING LIP MASK conditioning and deep moisturizing ingredients help your lips maintain their natural healthy and succulent condition.

✅ FREE GIFT: Get your Moisturizing Green Tea Matcha Sleeping Lip Mask together with a highly practical lip brush, for easier application and use in a glass container. All of our products by ONCE UPON A TEA come with a Hassle FREE MONEY-BACK SATISFACTION GUARANTEE , so you can buy our GREEN TEA MATCHA LIP MASK with confidence.
